title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4814.4 - Corporation statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4814.4 - Corporation statement

State Regulations

If the applicant is a corporation, the application shall
be accompanied by a corporation statement on form BC-105, as prescribed by the
commission. Each stockholder shall file an individual statement on form BC-103. The application shall also be accompanied by a list of employees, agents or
representatives on form BC-108. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4814.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
